    Our benefits

    Spoken or sign language

    On out platform you can find professional that are able to interpret both spoken and sign languages

    Book a meeting

    We will automatically find our
    best matched interpreter
    from our certified network

    Online videosession

    No need for a personally meeting.
    Reduce travel costs and
    CO2 emissions

    Don't care about security

    Everything is hosted
    in Switzerland and
    the communication is encrypted

    No administration & invoicing

    Our platform does all the administrative
    work for you. Search, book and pay
    interpreters. Save your time

    Easy handle your interpretion need

    With Translatel you will be able to add an interpreter in Minutes to your meeting. No travelcost, no long planing and searching. All at once, fully digital.
